verbs.description: ( CNN ) -- President Donald Trump 's chief economic adviser Larry Kudlow [V: has] been released from Walter Reed National Military Medical Center following a heart attack , White House press secretary Sarah Sanders said Wednesday . " Doctors say Larry 's recovery is going very well , " she said in a statement .
